EventDefinition.Comment: Set heading lock direction to current, rounded to whole number
Heading Lock: When off, then LED off
Heading Lock: When on, then LED on
OBS 1: Set to GPS Direct Course
Decrease throttle until lower limit reached
Decrease throttle until lower limit reached

EventActionChangeValue.SourceDataDefinition: IF( true, 0, Round(Max( Min( [SIMCONNECT:PLANE PITCH DEGREES], 20), -20), 2))
